title: Australia - my chosen home

abstract: Life was hard in Vietnam - I had to work many hours a day to support my family.
description: Vinh's study trip to Australia in 1997 changed his life forever. Hanoi may have been the place of his childhood memories but Australia would turn out to be a part of his life - his true home.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001300; Men's voices: Digital Storytelling project (Vietnamese men); Active; 2007
